name: The Black Swan Inn Culgaith

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel/inn for a short stay. The standard of the accommodation was good , the quality of the food was excellent and the staff were very attentive and proficient . I would certainly recommend it for a good base to explore the Lakes.
reviews.title: Very nice place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed one night, Saturday September 14th 2013 in a twin bedded room. Overall a pleasant stay.
reviews.title: Very friendly staff. Cramped room.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very friendly greeting by all staff. Booked mainly on the strength of the "home cooked, locally sourced" ingredients.
reviews.title: Tranquil and Friendly

reviews.text: Room pleasantly decorated but evidence of damp on one wall. Rather cramped. Narrow space between end of beds and furniture. Couldn't fully open the shower room door.
reviews.title: Great Eating

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Suggest booking a room at the back of the pub. We were at the front overlooking the car park. Windows are single glazed so noise from late night revellers and car engines resulted in a very disturbed night. Need to book time for evening meal on booking accommodation owing to very limited time slots, as we discovered.
reviews.title: Not a mucky duck to be seen!

aka: The Black Swan Inn Culgaith Hotel Culgaith
